effect.name: HSL Range
effect.description: Adjust Hue, Saturation and Lightness for a range of hue values. The user can specify the range of the hue values to be adjusted.
effect.author: Meltytech, LLC

parameter.name: hue_center
Hue Center
parameter.comment: The center value for the hue range

parameter.name: hue_range
Hue Range
parameter.comment: The width of the hue range

parameter.name: blend
Blend
parameter.comment: The amount to blend the edges of the hue range

parameter.name: h_shift
Hue Shift
parameter.comment: The amount to shift the hue in the hue range

parameter.name: s_scale
Saturation Scale
parameter.comment: The amount to scale the saturation in the hue range

parameter.name: l_scale
Lightness Scale
parameter.comment: The amount to scale the lightness in the hue range
